GenerateBettiP

\sphinxAtStartPar
Generates the Gaussian Random field with the specified paramters.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{description}\end{quote}

\sphinxAtStartPar

Numpy array: Gaussian Random field
